resources.string:
Established in 2008, iPredict ran as a political prediction market during the eight weeks prior to the election that year. It proved more accurate than three quarters of all political polls published in the run up to the election, confirming the effectiveness of money prediction markets.

 Since then, iPredict has accumulated over 4000 traders and has launched more than 7000 contracts, covering a wide variety of topics, from monthly gold prices, to the discovery of extraterrestrial life. 

 So, put your money where your mouth is and begin trading today!

iPredict is a New Zealand prediction market that offers prediction exchanges on current events, political issues and economic issues. iPredict is jointly owned by the New Zealand Institute for the Study of Competition and Regulation and Victoria University of Wellington.
Use your opinions or inside knowledge to trade on the outcome of a prediction.
Some of our traders have earned returns of over 2000%. You can start today with as little as $5.
Our markets cover a broad range of hot topics in the areas of politics, economics and social issues.
Access iPredict from anywhere, either through your mobile, tablet or desktop computer.
\"This is a quote from an iPredict user\"
\"This is a quote from an iPredict user\"
TRADE STOCKS IN FUTURE POLITICAL & ECONOMIC EVENTS
